channel.title: Just a reminder
channel.description: As this is a clan board, and some of the bigger clans have their own websites, I'd like to remind that linking to outside forums [b]is against the rules[/b], however since this can be a bit iffy, if it's a general gaming website such as [url=http://heavengames.com/]HeavenGames[/url], then you can post them.

item.title: Just a reminder
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

As this is a clan board, and some of the bigger clans have their own websites, I’d like to remind that linking to outside forums is against the rules, however since this can be a bit iffy, if it’s a general gaming website such as HeavenGames, then you can post them.

Read full topic
